title: WTB/WTTF:  T205 Christy Mathewson PSA/SGC 3-6, have a PSA 4 to sell/trade
author: bounce

posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF:  T205 Christy Mathewson PSA/SGC 3-6, have a PSA 4 to sell/trade
posts.post_content:
Decided to take the plunge and see if I can put together a BACK RUN!  :eek:

I really love this card, but I also like a good challenge.  I'm just getting started with it, so pretty much interested in anything.

I have a few, but potentially looking to upgrade so let me know what you've got.  I'm mostly looking for 3s to 6s, but I'd probably consider just about anything.

I haven't done all my research yet, so I'm assuming all the below exist.  I do know about the Cycle 1 loss, and I would definitely be interested in acquiring that as well.

Thanks in advance!

PM or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url].


American Beauty (Green)
Cycle
[STRIKE]Honest Long Cut[/STRIKE]
Hassan Factory 30
Piedmont Factory 42
[STRIKE]Piedmont Factory 25[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Polar Bear[/STRIKE]
Sovereign
[STRIKE]Sweet Caporal Factory 42 (Red)[/STRIKE]

[STRIKE]American Beauty (Black) - DNE[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Broadleaf (Brown) - DNE[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Broadleaf (Black) - DNE[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Drum - DNE[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Hindu - DNE[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Hassan Factory 649 - DNE[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Sweet Caporal Factory 42 (Black) - DNE[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Sweet Caporal Factory 25 (Black) - DNE[/STRIKE]


I also have these to sell/trade toward the ones I don't have if that's more interesting.

PSA 4 - $1600 OBO
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Mr42PS0l.jpg[/img][img]https://i.imgur.com/Hmvhm7tl.jpg[/img]

The T205 Matty exists with these brand backs:

American Beauty (Green)
Cycle
Honest Long Cut
Hassan Factory 30
Piedmont Factory 42
Piedmont Factory 25
Polar Bear
Sovereign
Sweet Caporal Factory 42 (Red)

Of those, the AB is by far the hardest, in my experience.
It’s a nice run to go for, not needing Drum, Hindu, or Broad Leaf.

around again - still looking for some Matty backs I don't have
